text: A biocide is a chemical that is used to kill living things to protect human activity, especially in agriculture and industry. The European Union divides biocides into disinfectants, preservatives, and pest control chemicals, with a short list of other biocides that don't fit any of those groups. ==Related pages== *Fungicide *Integrated pest management *Non-pesticide management *Oligodynamic effect *Virucide == References == Category:Biochemistry Category:Pesticides
title: Biocide
